definition: to go on holidays/to spend one's vacation (Tw)

sentences.english: The Huang family went to the countryside for vacation.
sentences.chinese: 黄家一家人去乡下渡假。

sentences.english: The family and I planned to leave Monday for a two-week vacation in California.
sentences.chinese: 我们全家计划星期一去加州两个星期渡假。

sentences.english: With so many island paradises to visit, it's no wonder the area is so popular.
sentences.chinese: 这区有许多岛屿渡假天堂可供游访，难怪如此热门。

sentences.english: "Sounds like quite a holiday so far, " I said to him.
sentences.chinese: 我对他说，“到目前为止我好像是在渡假。”

sentences.english: We provide food to the pets during their stay with us.
sentences.chinese: 本渡假村提供食物喂饲其宠物。

sentences.english: I got these Photos of loutas in Maya Roster VIllage.
sentences.chinese: 这是我在马雅渡假村里的池子拍的莲花。

sentences.english: The region is rich in geothermal water resources, the construction of the trench Shentang Resort.
sentences.chinese: 区内地热水资源十分丰富，兴建了神堂沟渡假村。

sentences.english: Hot spring resorts are a much more romantic variation on Beijing's bathhouses.
sentences.chinese: 在北京，温泉渡假胜地比公共浴室更有浪漫气息。

sentences.english: I'm hoping it can all be done before I go away on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 在去渡假之前，我希望能把这件事全搞定。

sentences.english: We went back to downtown east at about nine fifteen.
sentences.chinese: 我们在大约九点十五分时回到了乐怡渡假村。

sentences.english: They’re on vacation, far away from home, but they’re not enjoying themselves.
sentences.chinese: 他们在渡假，离家很远，但他们玩得并不开心。

sentences.english: Ah, tourism, vacation, Dongxiang good place to.
sentences.chinese: 啊，旅游渡假，侗乡好地方。

sentences.english: Ah, tourist vacation, a good place for The Dong.
sentences.chinese: 啊，旅游渡假，侗乡好地方。

sentences.english: Wynn Macau is the first Las Vegas-style blended resort in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 永利澳门是亚洲首间拉斯维加斯式的综合式渡假酒店。

sentences.english: President Bush will confer with President Putin in the Black Sea resort town of Sochi.
sentences.chinese: 布什总统将在黑海渡假胜地的索契市与普京总统会谈。

sentences.english: You should forget about going to Europe on vacation because it costs too much.
sentences.chinese: 你不要再想去欧洲渡假了，去那里的花销太大了。

definition: to spend one's leisure time/to idle away the time
to take all one's family along (idiom); encumbered by a family/tied down by family obligations
Wulai township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Wulai township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Nanfang-ao Port in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan
Puli, town in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
Yilan city and county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], northeast Taiwan
